properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.remote.host
properties.description: Host of the PDP server. E.g.: https://pdp.example.org:8443 .

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.remote.key
properties.description: PDP authentication key. By default a PDP server uses base authentication with a key as username and a secret as password.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.remote.secret
properties.description: PDP authentication secret. By default a PDP server uses base authentication with a key as username and a secret as password.
